notes: Conditional logic via Python control flow

pipeline_summary.name: global_dag
pipeline_summary.description: Comprehensive ETL pipeline processing French government death records and power plant data through staged ETL pattern with mixed topology

components.name: Extract City Geographic Data
components.description: Downloads city geographic coordinates mapping data from a static CSV endpoint

upstream_policy.description: Executes after all prerequisite data sources are available

components.name: Extract Nuclear Plant Data
components.description: Fetches nuclear power plant metadata and extracts CSV data from data.gouv.fr API

upstream_policy.description: Executes after all prerequisite data sources are available

components.name: Extract Thermal Plant Data
components.description: Fetches thermal power plant metadata and extracts CSV data from data.gouv.fr API

upstream_policy.description: Executes after all prerequisite data sources are available

components.name: Extract Death Records
components.description: Fetches death record metadata and downloads multiple death data files from data.gouv.fr API

upstream_policy.description: Executes after all prerequisite data sources are available

components.name: Create Death Table
components.description: Creates empty death records table in PostgreSQL using schema file

upstream_policy.description: Executes after schema file is available

components.name: Create Power Plants Table
components.description: Creates empty power plants table in PostgreSQL using schema file

upstream_policy.description: Executes after schema file is available

components.name: Load Death Data to Redis
components.description: Loads death records from ingestion files into Redis with deduplication tracking

upstream_policy.description: Executes after all death data files are ingested

components.name: Cleanse Death Data
components.description: Transforms death records with geographic mapping and date formatting using Redis data and city coordinates

upstream_policy.description: Executes after death data is loaded to Redis and city geo data is available

components.name: Cleanse Power Plant Data
components.description: Cleans and transforms power plant data with column standardization for both thermal and nuclear plants

upstream_policy.description: Executes after both thermal and nuclear plant data are ingested

components.name: Generate Plant SQL Queries
components.description: Generates SQL insertion queries for power plant data with deduplication by plant name

upstream_policy.description: Executes after both thermal and nuclear plant data are cleansed

components.name: Check Death Data Emptiness
components.description: Checks if death data processing produced valid SQL queries to determine branching path

upstream_policy.description: Executes after death insertion queries are generated

components.name: Store Deaths in PostgreSQL
components.description: Executes death data insertion into PostgreSQL when valid data exists

upstream_policy.description: Executes only if death data check indicates non-empty queries

components.name: Store Plants in PostgreSQL
components.description: Loads power plant data into PostgreSQL using generated SQL insertion queries

upstream_policy.description: Executes after plant insertion queries are generated

components.name: Clean Temporary Death Files
components.description: Cleans up temporary death data from Redis and file system after processing

upstream_policy.description: Executes regardless of success or failure of upstream tasks

description.default: Comprehensive ETL pipeline processing French government death records and power plant data through staged ETL pattern with mixed topology

batch_window.description: Batch window parameter name (e.g., ds, execution_date)

partitioning.description: Data partitioning strategy (e.g., daily, hourly, monthly)

depends_on_past.description: Whether execution depends on previous run success

CITY_GEO_DATASET_URL.description: URL for city geographic coordinates mapping data
CITY_GEO_DATASET_URL.constraints: Must be a valid URL to static.data.gouv.fr CSV endpoint

OUTPUT_FILE_PATH.description: Path to store the downloaded city geo location CSV file
OUTPUT_FILE_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

NUCLEAR_DATASET_ID.description: Dataset ID for nuclear power plant data on data.gouv.fr
NUCLEAR_DATASET_ID.constraints: Must be a valid dataset ID from data.gouv.fr

OUTPUT_JSON_PATH.description: Path to store nuclear plant metadata JSON file
OUTPUT_JSON_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

OUTPUT_CSV_PATH.description: Path to store extracted nuclear plant CSV data
OUTPUT_CSV_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

THERMAL_DATASET_ID.description: Dataset ID for thermal power plant data on data.gouv.fr
THERMAL_DATASET_ID.constraints: Must be a valid dataset ID from data.gouv.fr

OUTPUT_JSON_PATH.description: Path to store thermal plant metadata JSON file
OUTPUT_JSON_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

OUTPUT_CSV_PATH.description: Path to store extracted thermal plant CSV data
OUTPUT_CSV_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

DEATH_DATASET_ID.description: Dataset ID for death records on data.gouv.fr
DEATH_DATASET_ID.constraints: Must be a valid dataset ID from data.gouv.fr

OUTPUT_JSON_PATH.description: Path to store death record metadata JSON file
OUTPUT_JSON_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

MAX_RESOURCE.description: Maximum number of death data files to download

SQL_SCHEMA_FILE.description: Path to SQL schema file for creating death records table
SQL_SCHEMA_FILE.constraints: Must be a valid file path to SQL schema file

SQL_SCHEMA_FILE.description: Path to SQL schema file for creating power plants table
SQL_SCHEMA_FILE.constraints: Must be a valid file path to SQL schema file

INPUT_FILE_PATTERN.description: Pattern to match death data files for ingestion
INPUT_FILE_PATTERN.constraints: Must be a valid file pattern

REDIS_KEY.description: Redis key for storing raw death data
REDIS_KEY.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key

IMPORTED_FILES_KEY.description: Redis key for tracking imported death files
IMPORTED_FILES_KEY.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key

CITY_GEO_FILE.description: Path to city geographic coordinates CSV file
CITY_GEO_FILE.constraints: Must be a valid file path

REDIS_SOURCE_KEY.description: Redis key for source death data
REDIS_SOURCE_KEY.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key

OUTPUT_SQL_PATH.description: Path to output SQL insertion queries file
OUTPUT_SQL_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

THERMAL_INPUT_PATH.description: Path to raw thermal plant CSV data
THERMAL_INPUT_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

NUCLEAR_INPUT_PATH.description: Path to raw nuclear plant CSV data
NUCLEAR_INPUT_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

THERMAL_OUTPUT_PATH.description: Path to cleaned thermal plant CSV data
THERMAL_OUTPUT_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

NUCLEAR_OUTPUT_PATH.description: Path to cleaned nuclear plant CSV data
NUCLEAR_OUTPUT_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

THERMAL_CSV_PATH.description: Path to cleaned thermal plant CSV data
THERMAL_CSV_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

NUCLEAR_CSV_PATH.description: Path to cleaned nuclear plant CSV data
NUCLEAR_CSV_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

OUTPUT_SQL_PATH.description: Path to output SQL insertion queries file
OUTPUT_SQL_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

DEATH_INSERTION_QUERIES_PATH.description: Path to death data SQL insertion queries file
DEATH_INSERTION_QUERIES_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

SQL_QUERIES_PATH.description: Path to death data SQL insertion queries file
SQL_QUERIES_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

SQL_QUERIES_PATH.description: Path to power plant SQL insertion queries file
SQL_QUERIES_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

REDIS_KEY.description: Redis key for temporary death data
REDIS_KEY.constraints: Must be a valid Redis key

SQL_QUERIES_PATH.description: Path to temporary death SQL queries file
SQL_QUERIES_PATH.constraints: Must be a valid file path

INGESTION_DATA_PATH.description: Base path for ingestion data storage

STAGING_DATA_PATH.description: Base path for staging data storage

SQL_QUERIES_PATH.description: Base path for SQL queries storage

sources: data.gouv.fr API endpoints for French government datasets (death records, thermal plants, nuclear plants, city geo data)
static.data.gouv.fr CSV endpoint for city geographic coordinates
Local filesystem containing raw data files in /opt/airflow/dags/data/ingestion/
Redis cache containing raw death records and import tracking information
sinks: Local filesystem cleaned CSV files in /opt/airflow/dags/data/staging/
Local filesystem SQL query files in /opt/airflow/dags/sql/tmp/
